case.name: SZISF v Minister for Immigration and Multicultural Affairs [2006] FCA 1612 (23 November 2006)

citances.sentence: In appropriate circumstances the Court can exercise an implied statutory power to set aside an order made in the absence of the party where the absence was through no fault of that party: see also SZISF v Minister for Immigration and Multicultural Affairs [2006] FCA 1612.
